page.title: 13Recreation - Amser Hamdden.
page.content: Some of these activities are sometimes good for your health like walking, jogging and keeping fit. People are out of work in large cities and all over the country. Some get bored of having too much leisure time and some of these people turn into bad ways. The most popular activities of the women in our village is reading and walking, and the most popular activitis of the men are gardening and watching T.V . Some people have no time for leisure ,-some are always working and there is a saying,'too much work and no play makes Jack a dull boy.'Listed below are other activities in which local people are involved. Knitting. D.i.y. Walking. Fishing. Talking. Football.Cooking. Kricket. Gardening. Sewing. Sleeping.Golf.
